extendedInfo.description: TV Tracking made simple. Now with Trakt.TV Collection sync.Cliffhanger is an app designed especially for TV fans, with specific attention to simplicity and a user-friendly design.We are sure that using Cliffhanger will improve the way you manage your TV schedule. Enjoy!This app will help you keep track of your content, let you know when & where it is available, mark episodes as watched and even add calendar events.Enjoy exploring upcoming & previous episodes using our intuitive design, backed by Trakt.tv and IMDb databases.Cliffhanger will study your preferred shows, suggest similar programs you may like, and provide you with useful information.You can easily contribute by sharing it with your friends so we can reach a larger community to allow a more accurate experience, and open social possibilities. We sincerely appreciate your interest in Cliffhanger for Android, and we are sure that you and your friends will find it extremely useful.

reviews.title: Was much better before update.
reviews.comment: After quite a few updates, some that rendered the app almost unusable, we seem to finally be back at a decent, stable version. The new ability to shift time errors in the settings is very welcome.  Now I just have to wait to see if the ever present bug that was plaguing push notifications is still present, I also see multiples for some shows of the same episode. None of these are deal breakers though. This is once again, a fantastic app.
reviews.author: Paul Behin

reviews.title: An incredibly designed app.
reviews.comment: This is easily the best-designed app of its kind, and is usually fast and fluid. I like how quickly the developer updates to add features and fix bugs. And I like the new icon.  :-) (Update: Marking an episode as watched often fails, and I\'ve found that the app needlessly reloads information as I move through the interface.)
reviews.author: Demetrius Roman

reviews.title: Agh
reviews.comment: Have problem with the number of episodes. It shows me 10 cards of the same episode, frustrating man!
reviews.author: Firas Al-Ajely

reviews.title: Really great! But...
reviews.comment: The UI is very polished. The upcoming shows feature is my favorite. But it is force closing when opening the settings. Also it freezes at times, especially when checking watched shows. Please fix.  Edit: Everything runs smoothly now. Hoping for a widget soon... :)
reviews.author: Vividh Chandna

reviews.title: Still buggy...
reviews.comment: Even after 1.3.7 the app have a few serious bugs:  1. Breaking Bad S05 contains 112 episodes(?!) Apparently there are multiple copies of each episode.  2. Removing a series from my list causes a deadlock.
reviews.author: Avraham Shukron

reviews.title: Once again the best app for following and finding TV shows!
reviews.comment: It was a LONG time coming for the update to fix the wrong display time issues.   With the new update this app is once again the best and most intuitive app for following and finding TV shows. Well done!  This app would deserve 5 stars if it hadn\'t been completely useless due to a major time bug with a minor fix that was ignored by the developer.  In the future, please update small bugs that cause huge problems more timely!  I will gladly pay for a premium version of this app.
reviews.author: Zak Grotenstein

reviews.title: Fixed
reviews.comment: The app works fine again, thanks for fixing.
reviews.author: Kevin Matthew

reviews.title: V1.3.7 Doesn\'t work on my HTC
reviews.comment: I have to agree with people who have downloaded V1.3.7. The app no longer works on my HTC device. It continually locks up. I never had a problem with this app until 1.3.7.  Update: reinstalled this evening and it seems to be working as designed. No longer locks up. Thanks for fixing it.
reviews.author: Peter Shine

reviews.comment: even better than before.. where is the widget !?
reviews.author: Kevin Whelan

reviews.title: Not Sure What\'s Going On...
reviews.comment: By far, cosmetically, this app is #1 of its kind. Beautiful Holo theming and just simply clean. Few things I would like to see before I can give 5 \342\230\205s... widget (s) please... display if show is new, repeating, or canceled... dark/light UI themes. If some of these requests are implemented in future updates, 5 \342\230\205, no question.  Bug Fix Update 9.7.13 - I can now see upcoming episodes, but recent episodes are duplicated 2 or 3 times (i.e. most recent episode of \'Dexter\' displays same recent episode 3 times).
reviews.author: Candace Smith

reviews.title: It doesn\'t work at all.
reviews.comment: Freezes all the time and doesn\'t add any series: so a can\'t use it for nothing.
reviews.author: Jessie GR

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: The old app WORKED first of all. After a recent update you can no longer add any shows and the setting crashes the app. Plus the new icon not only looks worse but also copies the new YouTube icon.
reviews.author: Mike Spangler

reviews.title: Great app but should track popular non US shows
reviews.comment: No date for series 4 premiere of Downton Abbey yet. Also, add option for \'mark watched all up to\'. But the update has fantastic design
reviews.author: Nipun Kulshreshtha

reviews.title: Simply doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It crashes and freezes almost every time I open the app. And when it does open, upon pressing \"Add\" the button goes away and reappears and I find out it didn\'t add anything, then proceeds to crash. Terrible.
reviews.author: Alex R

reviews.title: I loved this app prior to its re-vamp
reviews.comment: Now it frustrates the hell out of me and responding \"bug fix rolling out \" on this version wouldn\'t help. I have reinstalled cleared data and still annoys me. I can open the app but can\'t add shows, going into settings FC\'s and I can\'t even go into a detailed view of a show. Please... I love this app with a passion... Though I still wish for the best with the team, thanks
reviews.author: Jamil Bousquet

reviews.title: Great app with a few niggles
reviews.comment: Great app with good functionality and looks great. Would be nice to go back to your place in the list when pressing back from a show rather than having to scroll from the top each time. Latest update appears to FC when trying to access settings.
reviews.author: Robert Blenkinsopp

reviews.title: Another bug
reviews.comment: Hi, after the latest update, I can\'t get into settings, each time I try to go to settings, I got kicked out of the app. Maybe some fix? Thanks
reviews.author: Timotius Victor

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Dear cliffhanger app engineers,  Please finally fix your app. It used to work amazing for me but since all these updates it doesn\'t work at all. My big issue is I can add shows but I can\'t track or view or do anything but just \"add\" the shows. Also, when I open the app it acts like its loading then nothing comes up. It\'s just blank. Then when I try to view a show that I add the app crashes. I tried resetting my phone, redownloading the app, and I do all the update and nothing is work. Please fix this!
reviews.author: Maddi Tater

reviews.title: Good but is force closing
reviews.comment: Since 1.3.7, the app is force closing when I select the settings button.
reviews.author: Justin Jackson

reviews.title: Great UI but very buggy
reviews.comment: App looks great and seems to have all the features I want. However, each update adds new bugs (please take your time and test your updates more thoroughly). Also, notifications never worked for me but it\'s mentioned that they are buggy.
reviews.author: Gordon Wong
